title: Support for Mac app built using Xamarin.Forms
body:
They released the preview of Xamarin.Forms for macOS apps: https://blog.xamarin.com/preview-bringing-macos-to-xamarin-forms/

Skiasharp fails when being added as a dependency. The post above mentions 'In order to work in a macOS project, packages must target xamarinmac20'.

Can this be added? Below is the error when adding the SkiaSharp for Xamarin.Forms NuGet package currently.

Thanks!

